refnamediv.refpurpose: Used to round the end of a cylinder with an ellipsoid.

refsection.para: Used to round the end of a cylinder with an ellipsoid. It creates an ELL shape with the given height at one end (base [b] or top [t]) of the specified RCC. If the height option is not specified, a spherical cap will be generated. The default end is the base.
The two examples show the use of the rcc-cap command to round the base and the top of a cylinder with an ellipsoid.

info.title: Round the base of a specified cylinder.

example.para: Creates an ELL shape named cap.s with a radius of 20 units at the base of rcc.s.

info.title: Round the top of a specified cylinder.

example.para: Creates an ELL shape named cap.s with a radius of 20 units at the top of rcc.s.
